title: De Havilland Canada - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2006, Viking Air of Victoria, British Columbia, purchased the type certificates for all the original out-of-production de Havilland Canada designs (DHC-1 to DHC-7). In November 2018, Viking Air's holding company, Longview Aviation Capital, announced the acquisition of the Dash 8 and Q400 program, the last DHC designs still held by Bombardier, along with the rights to the DHC name and trademark.
